name: CalculateChineseZodiacByYear
0:
”Alexa, open chinese zodiac”
”Alexa, open chinese zodiac for last year”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chinese zodiac
des:
This app will calculate the Chinese zodiac animal of the given year and also present the personality traits of people born in that year. All you need to provide is a year or date. For example, 1987, next year, today, etc. 

Usually, the Chinese spring festival is in January or February which brings two zodiac animals in one year. But as a Chinese, we all know if we are asked what zodiac animal it is in a particular year, it means we want to answer the animal that covers the majority of the year. For example in 2020, the year before 1/25/2020 belongs to the year of the pig and the year after 1/25 belongs to the year of the rat. But almost everyone in China will consider 2020 as the year of the rat. 

The personality traits are common sense from old Chinese wisdom. It's like the horoscope in western countries which are difficult to explain in Science. So please don't try to use it to analyze the personality in your daily work.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
